cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.3)
project(asl_pepper_evaluation)
find_package(catkin_simple 0.1.0 REQUIRED)
catkin_simple(ALL_DEPS_REQUIRED)
cs_install()
cs_install_scripts(openlab_evaluator/framesoft_live_eval)
cs_install_scripts(openlab_evaluator/ttg_live_eval)
cs_install_scripts(openlab_evaluator/loc_live_eval)
cs_export()
